usage.cn: 就算我不是你的那个谁，只要能让你幸福，我也愿意为你做任何事。
usage.eng: I'd do anything to make you happy.Even if I'm not yours.

usage.cn: 单身，并不意味着你不懂爱情
usage.eng: Being single doesn't mean that you don't know anything about love.

usage.cn: 你再也不必独自经历风雨， 因为，你现在有我了。
usage.eng: You'll never have to go through anything alone, ever again, because you have me now.

usage.cn: 如果你看到你生活中没有的东西，你就一无所有；如果你看到你生活中拥有的东西，你就拥有一切。
usage.eng: If you look at what you do not have in life, you don't have anything. If you look at what you have in life, you have everything.
